summary: The implementation successfully adds task checklist selection during case creation with all seven required task items and proper default states. The backend stores only selected tasks, and the frontend displays only those tasks on case cards. All requirements appear to be fully implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Added migration.mo file with data migration logic from OldChecklist to NewCompletedTasks
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest has a constraint to 'Maintain compatibility with existing case data structure' but does not explicitly request data migration functionality. The migration suggests renaming 'checklist' to 'completedTasks' which wasn't specified in requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Added CasesTasksFilter component for filtering cases by remaining tasks
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement requested filtering functionality by task types. This is a feature addition beyond the scope of REQ-1, REQ-2, and REQ-3.

hallucinated_features.description: Added task-based search functionality where searching for task names shows cases with incomplete tasks
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement requested enhancing search to include task names or filter by task completion status.

hallucinated_features.description: Added sorting options by open task count (most/fewest first)
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement requested sorting functionality based on task completion counts.
